Name: team_size_limit
Description: Team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 14 days

Name: blocker_resolution_time
Description: Blockers must be resolved within 2 days

Name: budget_constraint
Description: Project budget must not exceed the planned budget

Name: skill_requirement
Description: Each task must be assigned to a worker with the required skill

Name: role_assignment
Description: Each team must have exactly one Scrum Master and one Product Owner

Name: feature_priority_threshold
Description: Only features with priority >= 3 can be included in a release

Name: story_points_per_sprint
Description: Total story points per sprint must not exceed team velocity

Name: release_date_deadline
Description: Release must be delivered by the planned date

Name: roadmap_milestone
Description: All milestones in the roadmap must be achieved

Name: scrum_board_columns
Description: Scrum board must have at least 3 columns

Name: worker_availability
Description: Workers must be available during the sprint

Name: acceptance_criteria_met
Description: All user stories must meet their acceptance criteria

Name: retrospective_attendance
Description: All team members must attend the sprint retrospective
